caller_intent: The caller (Video) aimed to follow up on a commercial auto policy for an insured, likely regarding a claim or policy update.
resolution_steps: Agent asked for the policy number, which was provided as 977346967.
Agent confirmed the policy number and began searching for the appropriate agent (Gloria) to handle the request.
Agent requested the policy number again to ensure accuracy before transferring the call.
knowledge_required: Internal agent directory for policy-specific support
summary: The caller followed up on a commercial auto policy, and the agent obtained the policy number and initiated a transfer to Gloria for further assistance. The call was cut off before resolution.
